Title: I was beaten, detained, robbed by three policemen, says techie
Content: A city-based software engineer was allegedly beaten up, detained and later robbed by three policemen over a trivial row in K.R.Puram on Wednesday night. The victim, Venki Nallagutla, has filed a comp
Author: Special Correspondent
